00081 #ifndef _COMMON_VXLIB_TYPES_H_
00082 #define _COMMON_VXLIB_TYPES_H_ 1
00083 
00084 /* This header is needed to be included in OpenCL programs which link
00085  * against VXLIB, but OpenCL doesn't need the following headers */
00086 #ifndef __OPENCL_VERSION__
00087 #include <stdlib.h>
00088 #include <stdint.h>
00089 #include "TI_platforms.h"
00090 #include "VXLIB_bufParams.h"
00091 #endif
00092 
00093 typedef double VXLIB_D64;          
00094 typedef float VXLIB_F32;           
00097 typedef enum {
00098     VXLIB_SUCCESS = 0,                          
00099     VXLIB_ERR_FAILURE = 1,                      
00100     VXLIB_ERR_INVALID_VALUE = 2,                
00101     VXLIB_ERR_INVALID_TYPE = 3,                 
00102     VXLIB_ERR_INVALID_DIMENSION = 4,            
00103     VXLIB_ERR_NULL_POINTER = 5,                 
00104     VXLIB_ERR_NOT_IMPLEMENTED = 6,              
00105     VXLIB_ERR_NOT_EQUAL_WIDTH_STRIDE = 7,       
00106     VXLIB_ERR_NOT_ALIGNED_PTRS_STRIDES = 8,     
00107     VXLIB_ERR_NOT_ALIGNED_WIDTHS = 9,           
00108     VXLIB_ERR_BUFFER_TOO_SMALL = 10,            
00109     VXLIB_ERROR_MAX = 11
00110 } VXLIB_STATUS_NAME;
00111 
00112 typedef VXLIB_STATUS_NAME VXLIB_STATUS;    
00114 #define VXLIB_min(x, y) (((x) < (y)) ? (x) : (y)) 
00115 #define VXLIB_max(x, y) (((x) < (y)) ? (y) : (x)) 
00117 #define VXLIB_CONVERT_POLICY_WRAP 0U        
00118 #define VXLIB_CONVERT_POLICY_SATURATE 1U    
00120 #define VXLIB_INTERPOLATION_TYPE_NEAREST_NEIGHBOR 0U    
00121 #define VXLIB_INTERPOLATION_TYPE_BILINEAR 1U            
00122 #define VXLIB_INTERPOLATION_TYPE_AREA 2U                
00125 #define VXLIB_COLOR_SPACE_NONE 0x0          
00126 #define VXLIB_COLOR_SPACE_BT601_525 0x1     
00127 #define VXLIB_COLOR_SPACE_BT601_625 0x2     
00128 #define VXLIB_COLOR_SPACE_BT709 0x3         
00129 #define VXLIB_COLOR_SPACE_DEFAULT 0x3       
00131 #define VXLIB_TERM_ITERATIONS 0U    
00132 #define VXLIB_TERM_EPSILON 1U       
00133 #define VXLIB_TERM_BOTH 2U          
00135 #endif /* _COMMON_VXLIB_TYPES_H_ */
